body: @arekkas I agree with your concerns regarding CI test etc,  @bradfitz and you have the same result in that tests on your build can include or exclude vendor code using a flag (see again https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/19972/)  . Having said that, there will probably be some discussion around flagging any build that does not pass all tests including the vendored code. I think its good practice to write the *_test.go accordingly.  It looks like 19972 is still open.
